reviews.review_msg: Definitely seemed a bit all over the place this semester, but he is an amazing storyteller. He shortened our lecture times, had pretty easy tests. He has very interesting stories and is a pretty smart guy. Can sometimes come off like 'I know more than you,' especially on a 1 on 1 level. But overall, it was a good course over the summer
so amazing!! you can tell he loves what he does and just wants to be there for his students.

Prof Frie is a very good story teller; he makes you want to engage with him during class time! I took his class on Summer 2020 and it was REMOTE and classes were mandatory. You have weekly readings and they are crucial if you want to get a good grade. However, he is quite strict on deadlines. Once you miss your assignment it's an automatic 0.
Love him. His classes are mandatory but rather on the educational side - he likes interaction and actually is a good lecturer. Not dry at all.

Roger is lovely and has a sweet soul. His classes are simple and easy to follow and his tests are quite simple. Focus on the textbook as his lectures can be all over the place and he tests more on the textbook
great at lectures;  very approachable;  must talk in class to do well great story teller

Roger is no doubt a sensible person and teacher who wants his students to get good marks; his exams are fair, based on lecture and text and is actually quite simple (it's more of a long quiz). However,  he tends to ramble a lot and repeat the same things and although it's a seminar, he does 90% of the talking so the course is more of a lecture.

Roger is a really enthusiastic professor, but I found he was a bit scattered in his "lectures." He gives you all the information you need to study for exam so very easy to get a good mark. He says it's a discussion class but he seems to do most of the talking.
ROGER IS AN AWESOME, GENUINE PROFF. KEEPS CLASSES INTRIGUING AND EXAMS ARE STRAIGHT FORWARD. HE PREPARES YOU WELL.

Awesome Prof! Tells you exactly what he is looking for! If you listen and contribute during class you will get a good mark. The readings are easy. The tests are easy if you study what he tells you to study. He is super friendly and approachable! I would take another course with him.
Was a much better Psychology class. Frie was a good professor and has a very interesting take on Psychoanalysis. He was a good teacher!! When given the choice, I recommend choosing him.
